original_text: But Sihon, the king of Heshbon, refused to let us travel through his country. He was too proud to agree with us. The Lord our God had caused him to be like that. He wanted to put King Sihon under your power and give his land to you. You still live in his land today.
korean_text: 헤스본 왕 시혼이 우리가 통과하기를 허락하지 아니하였으니 이는 네 하나님 여호와께서 그를 네 손에 넘기시려고 그의 성품을 완강하게 하셨고 그의 마음을 완고하게 하셨음이 오늘날과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: But Sihon, the king of Heshbon
refused to let us travel through his country
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그의 나라를 통과하는 것을 거절했습니다

sentences.original_text: He was too proud to agree with us
The Lord our God had caused him to be like that
sentences.korean_translation: 주 우리 하나님이 그를 그렇게 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He wanted to put King Sihon under your power
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 시혼 왕을 여러분의 권세 아래 두고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: and give his land to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 땅을 여러분에게 주고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: You still live in his land today
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분은 오늘날 그의 땅에 여전히 살고 있습니다
